subtasks: Gather the necessary tools for seed drill preparation
Check the seed drill's current condition
Adjust the seed drill's spacing mechanism
Clean the seed drill's mechanism to prevent malfunctions
Lubricate the seed drill's moving parts to ensure smooth operation
Set the seed drill's depth according to the crop requirements
Test the seed drill's mechanism to check if adjustments are needed

tasks.task: Operate the seed drill during planting
subtasks: Secure the seed drill onto the farming vehicle
Attach the appropriate seed box to the seed drill
Fill the seed box with seeds, ensuring correct quantity and type
Set the seed drill's speed to match the farming vehicle's throttle
Adjust the depth gauge wheels to control the planting depth
Monitor the seed drill's operation while driving through the field
Check for proper seed placement and coverage after planting
Adjust the seed drill's settings as needed during the planting process

tasks.task: Maintain the crop during the growing period
subtasks: Regularly check the crop's growth and overall health
Monitor soil moisture levels and water the crops if necessary
Look for signs of pests or diseases and take appropriate actions
Apply fertilizers or other crop nutrients according to the crop's needs
Control weeds through mechanical or chemical means as needed
Monitor the weather and take protective measures if a storm is expected
Determine the optimal harvest time based on crop maturity
Set up the harvesting machinery or equipment
Operate the harvesting equipment while moving through the fields
Collect and clean the harvested crops, separating good from unusable portions
Store the harvested crops properly to prevent spoilage

tasks.task: Clean and maintain the equipment after the harvest
subtasks: Disassemble the harvesting equipment to clean individual components
Scrub the machinery surfaces to remove dirt and debris
Lubricate moving parts to prevent wear and tear during storage
Inspect the equipment for any damage or wear that requires repair
Store the machines in a dry location to protect them from moisture
